speaker: YOUNG MAN
line: Oh, my God! That was... that was incredible. I mean it. You don't believe me. Can you hear me? Hey, I... I don't even know your name.

speaker: HORTON
line: New York businessman calls his wife to say good night, then goes out and picks up some chippy. He brings her back here for sex. Beyond that, well, nothing makes a whole lot of sense.

speaker: SCULLY
line: How's that?

speaker: HORTON
line: Security monitor records the victim entering the room with midnight.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Couldn't she just have changed clothes?

speaker: HORTON
line: Thought of that. Male is definitely a different person - short hair and at least 30 pounds heavier. The video never recorded his entry, nor the chippy ever leaving.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Well, we're 30 floors up, no other means of egress. Did the medical examiner establish a cause of death?

speaker: HORTON
line: Guy blew an artery. Must have been some roll in the hay.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Hard to imagine in this day and age someone having sex with a perfect stranger. Any sign of robbery?

speaker: HORTON
line: The male exited wearing the victim's suit, carrying a suitcase. The wallet's gone.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You know, I don't even know why we got this call in the first place.

speaker: HORTON
line: Really? Somebody at the Bureau put out a memo requesting any case involving this exact COD. I assumed it was...

speaker: MULDER
line: Thanks for the call.

speaker: MULDER
line: Five deaths. Four in the last six weeks between here and Boston. In each case, the victim dies in the throes of passion. Two women and three men, including the last one.

speaker: SCULLY
line: All young, healthy adults.

speaker: MULDER
line: All with symptoms of massive coronary arrest.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You think there's a new drug on the streets?

speaker: MULDER
line: The oldest drug, not even illegal. Each body showed the presence of huge amounts of pheromones.

speaker: SCULLY
line: The chemicals animals secrete? You mean, sexual attractants?

speaker: MULDER
line: Radar love. Only about a hundred times stronger than found anywhere in nature, strong enough to product anaphylactic shock or a coronary.

speaker: SCULLY
line: So you think somebody is synthesizing them?

speaker: MULDER
line: It's been done, but in nowhere near these concentrations and hold on to your hat, Scully, 'cause you're gonna love this. The pheromones we're talking about - they contain human DNA.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Well, there's still a question as to whether humans can produce pheromones. So how can that be?

speaker: MULDER
line: I don't know. But if it's true, then this guy is a walking aphrodysiac. He's the ultimate sex magnet.

speaker: SCULLY
line: He or she? You've got victims of both sexes. Both a man and a woman on the hotel security monitor.

speaker: MULDER
line: I know. That is a puzzle.

speaker: SCULLY
line: So what is our profile of the killer? Indeterminate height, weight, sex. Unarmed but extremely attractive.

speaker: MULDER
line: It gets weirder. As I said, there's been four deaths matching this MO in the last six weeks - in Boston, Hartford, Philadelphia and here in Washington.

speaker: SCULLY
line: The killer's moving south.

speaker: MULDER
line: There was a death I made a note of about a year ago with the same symptoms. A 32 year-old UMW labor organizer was found dead outside a town called Steveston in the woods of Massachusetts, home to a sect of religious isolationists called 'The Kindred'.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Right. They live up there without electricity, phones, any modern amenities, a lot like the Amish.

speaker: MULDER
line: The Kindred are known for their handmade stoneware pottery. They mine the clay themselves in the local hills.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What's so weird about that?

speaker: MULDER
line: The white clay in those hills is particular to that region. It's also the same substance I scraped out of the scratches on the latest victim's sides.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Well, wait a minute. Aren't these people famous for their abstinence and their pure Christian ways?

speaker: MULDER
line: Yes, but it looks as if one of them may have forgotten to clean under his fingernails.

speaker: WOMAN
line: Hi.

speaker: MULDER
line: Excuse me, ma'am, this is federal Agent Scully, I'm Agent Mulder.

speaker: SCULLY
line: We're investigating a possible murder.

speaker: WOMAN
line: Oh, there aren't many killings around here.

speaker: MULDER
line: What can you tell me about the Kindred? They keep pretty much to themselves, huh?

speaker: MAN
line: Yeah, some folks say it's because they're doing ceremonies up there. Voodoo or something. I've got nothing against them, myself. They bring in the tourists.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Did the Kindred let you take those pictures?

speaker: MAN
line: Oh, those. Those are from back in the thirties.

speaker: MULDER
line: What about the missing ones?

speaker: MAN
line: I'm having them reframed. They're right here under the counter.

speaker: MULDER
line: Can I take a look at them?

speaker: MAN
line: Sure.

speaker: MULDER
line: How would I get up to see them?

speaker: MAN
line: Oh, they don't like strangers up there much. Road's in pretty rough shape. That's Steveston.

speaker: MAN
line: That's them now. They usually shop at the feed store.

speaker: MULDER
line: Excuse me. Ladies? I think I'm gonna go inside. You need anything from the feed store?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Hi.

speaker: SCULLY
line: She must have problems on the asphalt. Has she ever thrown a shoe? What's her name?

speaker: BROTHER ANDREW
line: Alice.

speaker: SCULLY
line: That's sweet. Did you name her?

speaker: BROTHER ANDREW
line: We named her all together. I'm not allowed to talk outside.

speaker: SCULLY
line: That's all right. I'm Dana Scully. I don't mean you any harm.

speaker: KINDRED MAN
line: Brother Andrew.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully, what are you doing?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I was just talking...

speaker: MULDER
line: You all right?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yeah, I think so.

speaker: MULDER
line: You want to sit down?

speaker: MULDER
line: Interesting way of life. You get any sense about them?

speaker: SCULLY
line: There's something up there, Mulder.

speaker: MULDER
line: Oh, I've been saying that for years.

speaker: MULDER
line: Oh, for a 4-wheel drive. Looks like about a mile walk.

speaker: SCULLY
line: After you.

speaker: MULDER
line: Now... this... that's west.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What does the map say?

speaker: MULDER
line: That we should be there already.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, look.

speaker: SCULLY
line: We're FBI agents. Federal police.

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm Agent Mulder, this is Agent Scully. We're here to investigate a murder.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'm going to have to ask you to remain at a distance, please, sir.

speaker: BROTHER OAKLEY
line: Your weapons are forbidden here. We can outlast you at this spot. You're not leaving where we stand until your guns are handed to our Council. You'll have them again, as you leave.

speaker: MULDER
line: We can't do that.

speaker: SISTER ABIGAIL
line: Please. I'm Sister Abby. This is Brother Oakley. We're all saddened by what has happened in your world, but it does not concern us. Up here, no one kills another - ever.

speaker: SCULLY
line: We just want to have a few questions answered.

speaker: SISTER ABIGAIL
line: It is your weapons that are unwelcome here, not you. Come and pray with us, be one of us, and you'll see that we harm no one. Please relinquish your weapons. Please.

speaker: SISTER ABIGAIL
line: Now there is no reason to be afraid.

speaker: BROTHER OAKLEY
line: Come. Sit.

speaker: SISTER ABIGAIL
line: Let us pray as one. We who are separate give thanks for our alloted time in this world. We ask for strength that we may bring forth the bounty that God has provided.

speaker: ALL
line: Amen.

speaker: SISTER ABIGAIL
line: We pray for the day of the coming, the moment of our release.

speaker: ALL
line: Amen.

speaker: SISTER ABIGAIL
line: Let us eat.

speaker: MULDER
line: I was wondering if we might ask a few questions. We're looking for someone we believe may have come from here.

speaker: SCULLY
line: We have pictures.

speaker: SISTER ABIGAIL
line: We do not allow pictures.

speaker: SCULLY
line: A crime has been committed. We have certain questions that we need answered, if you'll forgive us.

speaker: BROTHER ANDREW
line: What are these pictures?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Hotel security videos of a man and a woman who may have committed a murder.

speaker: BROTHER ANDREW
line: Where was this crime committed?

speaker: SCULLY
line: In a hotel in Washington, DC.

speaker: MULDER
line: If we can arrange for you to look at the video tape, maybe you can identify the individual.

speaker: BROTHER ANDREW
line: How much violence has this person caused in your world?

speaker: MULDER
line: Five murders, so far.

speaker: SCULLY
line: And may kill again, which is why we need your help.

speaker: MULDER
line: Has anyone left here recently?

speaker: BROTHER WILTON
line: Your world does not interest us. We have no need for your violence or your questions. I've said what is needed. They have no right to be here at this time.

speaker: SISTER ABIGAIL
line: Brother Wilton, stand. Before we can accept any man's person, we must accept our own. And I ask, who can stand in your sight when once you are angry. I am ashamed to lift up my face, and I shall not be ashamed in this evil time. Make atonements for this wrath, Brother Wilton.

speaker: MULDER
line: That's all right. We didn't take any offense.

speaker: BROTHER ANDREW
line: Anger, as violence, is not tolerated. Our brother must be admonished.

speaker: SCULLY
line: He can't breathe.

speaker: SISTER ABIGAIL
line: He does not need your help.

speaker: SCULLY
line: He's choking to death!

speaker: SISTER ABIGAIL
line: Remove Brother Aaron from the dining hall.

speaker: SISTER ABIGAIL
line: We did not invite you here to interfere.

speaker: BROTHER ANDREW
line: We take care of our own.

speaker: MARTY (MALE)
line: Would you like to dance?

speaker: BLONDE WOMAN
line: Not right now. Look, I'm really not interested, OK?

speaker: MARTY (MALE)
line: Just one dance?

speaker: BLONDE WOMAN
line: Hi.

speaker: MARTY (MALE)
line: One dance?

speaker: BROTHER WILTON
line: It's a mile to your car. Stay in the path.

speaker: MULDER
line: Thanks for your cooperation.

speaker: MULDER
line: The Addams family finds religion.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Take me back to the 20th century.

speaker: MULDER
line: You believe all that back there, Scully?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Believe all what?

speaker: MULDER
line: All that "we take care of our own" business?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Well, they better take care of their own or that man at the dinner table is a dead man.

speaker: MULDER
line: I think it was all an elaborate act.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What? The choking?

speaker: MULDER
line: No, all this simple life, living from abundance crap. These people know something, Scully. You can see it in their eyes - the way they look at one another.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Do you think they know who the murderer is?

speaker: MULDER
line: Did you notice how they managed not to answer a single question of ours? And that outburst at the table was right on cue. Somehow, they got us to answer their questions. Did you ask yourself why there weren't any children around?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I know, that was odd.

speaker: MULDER
line: You want to know what was really odd? You know those pictures we saw down in the store in Steveston today, the ones from the thirties? I swear I saw some of those same faces at the dinner table tonight.

speaker: SCULLY
line: These people have probably been intermarrying for years.

speaker: MULDER
line: Maybe. Maybe not everything is as black and white as it appears to be.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What are you doing?

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm going to go back for a little look-see.

speaker: MULDER
line: Maybe they went to the movies. Do you hear that?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Uh-huh.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What do you think?

speaker: MULDER
line: I think I want to see what's in that cellar.

speaker: BROTHER ANDREW
line: Come with me. I can give you information.

speaker: BROTHER ANDREW
line: I know who did it.

speaker: SCULLY
line: The murders?

speaker: BROTHER ANDREW
line: You've heard our prayers. You've seen how we live our beliefs. I want you to find this killer. I want you to find him for me. He was my best friend.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What's his name?

speaker: BROTHER ANDREW
line: Brother Martin. I called him Marty.

speaker: BROTHER ANDREW
line: Marty was different.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What do you mean, different?

speaker: BROTHER ANDREW
line: How does he kill?

speaker: SCULLY
line: We're not sure. All of the victims died of cardiac arrest.

speaker: BROTHER ANDREW
line: He poisons them, doesn't he?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Maybe, how do you know that?

speaker: BROTHER ANDREW
line: I need to show you something... something about Marty.

speaker: BROTHER ANDREW
line: We found them out on route 44. We were wandering. Marty and I used to do that - explore the edges of our world. Someone must have left them for garbage. They are garbage.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Why did you keep them?

speaker: BROTHER ANDREW
line: It was Martin who kept them. Some of what I saw in the magazines... some of it was beautiful, but most of it I didn't like. It was garish. But Martin - Marty - he couldn't get enough. He liked even the paper it was printed on - slick. Marty was captured by your world. He left us to become one of you.

speaker: KINDRED MAN #1
line: Brother Wilton! The woman has returned.

speaker: BROTHER WILTON
line: Where is she?

speaker: KINDRED MAN #1
line: With Andrew, in the main house.

speaker: BROTHER WILTON
line: What about the other one?

speaker: KINDRED MAN #1
line: He's missing.

speaker: BROTHER WILTON
line: Come.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You said Marty was different.

speaker: BROTHER ANDREW
line: Yes.

speaker: SCULLY
line: How? How did he kill his victims?

speaker: BROTHER ANDREW
line: I could be banished.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Does it have something to do with the ceremony in the barn tonight?

speaker: SCULLY
line: What are you doing?

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully...

speaker: BROTHER ANDREW
line: Marty is different. We're all different.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Oh... oh.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully?

speaker: MULDER
line: Get off of her!

speaker: SISTER ABIGAIL
line: I asked you not to interfere.

speaker: MULDER
line: What the hell were you doing back there?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I don't know.

speaker: MULDER
line: You don't know?

speaker: SCULLY
line: No.

speaker: MULDER
line: You all right?

speaker: MICHAEL
line: I wasn't ignoring you. No. Of course I saw you, I just didn't recognize you, that's all. Excuse me, I'm having a conversation...

speaker: SCULLY
line: Thanks.

speaker: MULDER
line: How you feeling?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Better... a little embarrassed, actually.

speaker: MULDER
line: Why? You don't remember any of it.

speaker: SCULLY
line: It's like I don't remember...

speaker: MULDER
line: Why didn't you get out of there before he...

speaker: SCULLY
line: Because he told me he knew who the killer was.

speaker: MULDER
line: How did you know he wasn't the killer?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I believed him.

speaker: SCULLY
line: So what did you see down in the cellar?

speaker: MULDER
line: Just Brother what's-his-name buried in some gopher hole in the wall. Buried alive.

speaker: SCULLY
line: How do you know he was alive?

speaker: MULDER
line: Because I was in there with him. And his face was... was different. Even his hair, it was almost feminine. It was like he was going through some kind of a transformation.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Changing sexes?

speaker: MULDER
line: That would explain the hotel security video.

speaker: SCULLY
line: So you're saying these people...

speaker: MULDER
line: I know what I saw, Scully. And I saw you about to do the wild thing with some stranger.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Think he was trying to kill me?

speaker: MULDER
line: Maybe it's the sex that kills.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Well, if he was trying to kill me, why did they let us go?

speaker: MULDER
line: I don't know.

speaker: COP
line: All right. Let's break it up. Out of the car.

speaker: MARTY (FEMALE)
line: Sorry, officer.

speaker: COP
line: You, too. You a pro?

speaker: MARTY (FEMALE)
line: Pro?

speaker: COP
line: What?

speaker: MICHAEL
line: On a scale of 1 to 10, she was a kind 3. But there was something about her.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Did she touch you or make physical contact in any other manner?

speaker: MICHAEL
line: Her touch was... electric. But after that, I remember only vaguely.

speaker: MULDER
line: What do you remember?

speaker: MICHAEL
line: Nothing, actually.

speaker: MULDER
line: Try to remember, Michael. The policeman at the scene supports what you said, but maybe there was something... unusual about this woman. Something you wouldn't feel comfortable telling the police on the record.

speaker: MICHAEL
line: But this is off the record?

speaker: MULDER
line: Absolutely.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What did you see, Michael?

speaker: MICHAEL
line: After she left the car and she was fighting with the cop, I saw her in her clothes and she looked like...... she looked like a man.

speaker: SCULLY
line: She was a man.

speaker: MICHAEL
line: Hustling in the club scene used to be so simple. That's off the record.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scout's honor.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Well, I can't rule out the possiblity that who we're looking for is a transvestite.

speaker: MULDER
line: I think Don Juan in there knows the difference between the male and the female of the species.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I just don't want us to ignore the obvious. I mean, how else could you explain a woman overpowering a 200-pound cop? She was a he.

speaker: AGENT #1
line: Agent Mulder? Agent Scully? The credit card that was stolen from the last victim in DC was just used to order takeout in a hotel downtown, about 8 blocks from here.

speaker: MARTY (FEMALE)
line: It was always forbidden, but after the first time I couldn't help myself. Touching a human man, or a woman, is as powerful for me as it was for you.

speaker: SCULLY
line: This is Agent Scully requesting police backup and additional agents at 771 Catherine Street. It's the Hotel Catherine.

speaker: MARTY (FEMALE)
line: Your world offers pleasures - pleasures we don't know because we're different. But you know that now. The others will punish me for what I've done. They'll find me, because the day is coming and they won't leave without me.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder!

speaker: MULDER
line: Delivery!

speaker: MULDER
line: FBI! FBI! Clear! Stay down!

speaker: SCULLY
line: Dead body!

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'm OK.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully. Down the stairs...

speaker: SCULLY
line: Federal agent, I'm armed! Back away!

speaker: SCULLY
line: Step away! Step away!

speaker: BROTHER ANDREW
line: Please. Don't hurt him.

speaker: SCULLY
line: No. Step away. I'm armed.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully!

speaker: AGENT #2
line: MULDER: What if they did get through? There's only place they'd hide.

speaker: SCULLY
line: They're gone.

speaker: AGENT #2
line: We found something in the hayfield.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I don't understand. How can they just disappear? They have no means of transportation.

speaker: MULDER
line: No earthly means of transportation.
